text: The Uniunea Independenta Pentru Sighisoara (UIPS) is the ruling party of Sighisoara in Romania. It is represented by the actual mayof of Sighisoara, Iulian SÃ®rbu. It is the first ruling independent and local party in the history of the city. Category:Political parties in Romania
title: Uniunea Independenta Pentru Sighisoara (Romania)
